pages.text: This entry contains the crafting recipes for the luxury trapdoors from Supplementaries.
It's a golden trapdoor, what did you expect?
You'll probably be fine while flexing this. $(br2)Did I mention you can lock the Netherite Trapdoor?
Supplementaries lets you lock and unlock stuff with this key.
It's a silver trapdoor. $(br2)Behaves like an Iron Door.
It's a lead trapdoor. $(br2)Takes multiple clicks to open.
